Tuesday/Friday/Saturday Dance Mix - Pavilion Grille - Boca Raton - Florida Dance Vacations Florida Dance Vacations Navigation Accommodations Attractions Instructors News & Deals Contact Social Dance Calendar Accommodations Attractions Instructors News & Deals Contact Social Dance Calendar Tuesday/Friday/Saturday Dance Mix – Pavilion Grille – Boca Raton Call us at 561-912-0000 or 954-214-1924 We are located in a Four Story Airy Indoor Atrium! All tables, chairs, railings and counters are sanitized repeatedly. PLEASE COME OUT AND SUPPORT US AND OUR MUSICIANS Dinner from 6 pm and Music from 7:30 pm – Saturday music begins at 8:00 pm View our entertainment on our website: www.paviliongrille.com/calendar Event Details Dance Style Swing/Hustle/Party Mix Start time 7:30 pm End time 10:00 pm Share Venue Details Phone 561-912-0000 Email paviliongrille@gmail.com Website paviliongrille.com/ Venue Pavilion Grille Address 301 Yamata Rd City Boca Raton Click For Directions Click For Directions |||:: 301 Yamato Rd, Boca Raton, Fl 33431 Share this with a friend! Facebook Twitter Email Comments 4 Marshall Wisset March 21, 2023 at 7:20 pm When will Uptown Express appear agsin at the pavillion grill Reply Post Author Diane Hurwit April 2, 2023 at 5:14 pm Thank you for your question. FloridaDanceVacations.com does not organize any dances. It is a comprehensive information portal which posts the variety of social dances by all organizers throughout South Florida. If you have a question about a specific dance or venue, contact the organizer/host or venue directly. To find a complete listing of venues, visit http://www.FloridaDanceVacations.com Reply Lynda March 31, 2023 at 9:40 pm What night in May /“2: will u have dNcing and music? Reply Post Author Diane Hurwit April 2, 2023 at 5:15 pm Thank you for your question. FloridaDanceVacations.com does not organize any dances. It is a comprehensive information portal which posts the variety of social dances by all organizers throughout South Florida. If you have a question about a specific dance or venue, contact the organizer/host or venue directly. To find a complete listing of venues, visit http://www.FloridaDanceVacations.com Reply Leave a Reply Cancel reply Your email address will not be published. Required fields are marked * Comment * Name * Email * Website Sponsors Social Find us online at these social media channels. Copyright © 2020 Beach Vacation Rentals. Website Accessibility Statement. Team Board - Logovisual Ltd +44 (0) 1756 792300 +44 (0) 1756 792300 About Services Collaboration Spaces Products ThinkingWall® Dividers Large mobile dividing walls with whiteboard surface plus storage or AV screen. More Acoustics Mobile acoustic walls with whiteboard, storage, and space for an AV screen. More Originals Our original whole wall whiteboard and simple mobile freestanding unit. More Desks, Tables & Seating Whiteboard desks and whiteboard tables, plus collaboration area seating. More Custom Whiteboards Custom Printed Whiteboards Magnetic Drywipe Maps Custom Printed Portable Whiteboards Custom Shaped Whiteboards Magnetic Year Planner Whiteboard Magnetic UK Map Whiteboard Magnetic Overlays Printed Planning Whiteboards Mobile & Freestanding Whiteboards ThinkingWall® Freestander ThinkingWall® Acoustic Freestander ThinkingWall® Acoustic Curve ThinkingWall® Mobile Acoustic AV ThinkingWall® Mobile Acoustic Shelf ThinkingWall® AV Divider ThinkingWall® Divider ThinkingWall® Stor Wall Mounted Whiteboards ThinkingWall® Whole Wall Frameless Magnetic Whiteboards Custom Sized Frameless Whiteboards Custom Printed Magnetic Leaderboards Custom Printed Leaderboard Leaderboard Name Strips Whiteboard Magnetics Custom Magnets Standard Magnets MagNotes Visual Thinking Solutions Visual Thinking Products MagNotes & Sticky Notes AV Conferencing Tools Featured product ThinkingWall ® Divider View Featured product ThinkingWall ® Freestander View Projects News Shop Printed Whiteboards and Leaderboards Collaboration Tools AV Conferencing Tools Magnotes & Sticky Notes Magnets Pens Cleaning Visual Thinking Products Contact Search +44 (0) 1756 792300 Home | Shop | Visual Thinking Solutions | Visual Thinking Products | Whiteboard Process Tool Kits | Team Board Team Board £ 105.00 Lightweight double-sided magnetic dry wipe team board 800mm x 630mm. Supplied in professional carry case with hand and shoulder straps. (total weight: 2.75kg). Special Requirements Quantity Add to basket Category: Whiteboard Process Tool Kits Description Reviews (0) Product Description Lightweight double-sided magnetic dry wipe team board 800mm x 630mm. This is slightly broader but shorter than A1 size. Supplied in a professional carry case with hand and shoulder straps. (total weight: 2.75kg). Reviews There are no reviews yet. Be the first to review “Team Board” Cancel reply You must be logged in to post a review. You may also like Team Modeller Enquire now Hook-Up Portable Whiteboards Enquire now Custom Printed Portable Whiteboards Enquire now Logovisual have previously supplied whiteboard panels for our London office, so when we needed whiteboards for a room at our head office we got in touch. The end result looks good – many thanks. ADRIAN SHAH-CUNDY, VOLKER WESSELLS All looks fantastic thank you!! The guys were a pleasure to meet and it was all so hassle free. CHARLOTTE WALTERS, TUNGSTEN NETWORK Commissioned Logovisual to design and install a folding wall in one of our technology rooms. Both our company and the NHS Trust were absolutely delighted with the installation a first for all. PETER SALT, IMMERSIVE Clear and prompt communication throughout and a very smooth installation process. Nothing was too hard. Highly recommended! TRACEY COVE, STEVENS & COVE Excellent, high quality product, purchased after wise advice and installed quickly by friendly installers. Perfect product for our meeting room needs. MIA ELLIOTT, DIOCESE OF GUILDFORD The board looks great! And I’d like to say your installers were absolutely fantastic, so friendly, organised and cleaned up. JESS MARTIN, VAYNERMEDIA Logovisual really understood our brief and made some great suggestions to make our designs come to life. They helped us bring a child’s game from a small tin to a life size piece of experiential, for us to take in to store at John Lewis. Everyone loved it. Thank you guys. TAMARA SPURWAY, WILD & WOLF As a product, they really provide a varied functionality to aid in our brainstorming and project works. These mobile whiteboards have really been an excellent investment and are immensely popular with our staff. SEBASTIAN FRANCIS-JONES, C SPACE The whole process from start to finish was excellent and the final product was second to none. Highly recommend Logovisual and the team and will be using them again very soon for the next project. LYNNE BRODA, OXFORD CARTOGRAPHERS The install was fab the guys were excellent and we all love the wall, so much in fact we are thinking of future projects including them. Once again can’t thank you enough for a great thorough service. ZOE HARRIS, CBRE GLOBAL INVESTORS Logovisual had as I believed to be the simplest and hassle free job on the project, install of white boards. They were in and out within 3 hours, a job well done! THE PROJECT TEAM, OVERBURY PLC The product itself is superbly built and easy to manoeuvre around with the attached wheels. From the office team’s communication before our event to the delivery team’s installation and pickup I found everyone to be really helpful and very professional going out of their way to meet our deadlines. I would certainly recommend logovisual. SHAUN O’HARA, SAATCHI & SAATCHI WELLNESS We were looking for a new “canvas” to share information and encourage joint thinking. The Thinking Wall turned out to be the perfect solution. There’s room to be expansive and for things to have real impact. The service we received right from our first enquiry, to installation (very fast, very painless) has been excellent. STEPHEN CROWE, SCOTTISH FUNDING COUNCIL We were pleased with the high level of customer service, our order was dealt with quickly and efficiently and we are thrilled with the finished product. The custom whiteboards that are exactly as we had envisaged them. STEVE CROSTHWAITE, HOTSPUR PRIMARY SCHOOL Just wanted to thank you again for your help, had a small amount of feedback from our client: Whiteboards are superb. Even better than expected! LEE, IDEA UK DESIGN & MARKETING The products look amazing and your team were clean, tidy and considerate. Pavillion Grille | Boca Raton Venue | PartySlate Skip to content Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Venues Planners Vendors Ideas Pavillion Grille Find Venues / Florida / Boca Raton / Pavillion Grille Unclaimed Pavillion Grille 301 Yamato Rd, Boca Raton, FL 33431, USA Request info Favorite Owner hasn't claimed this business If you own this business, claim your profile to update information, add photos, and more. Claim Profile Overview Gallery 1 About Pavillion Grille Pavilion Grille in Boca Raton Florida is known for great Restaurant Food and Special Celebrations.
The perfect place for your Wedding, Bar/Bat MItzvah, Sweet Sixteen, Fund-raiser or Corporate Event or other Special Celebrations.

Pavilion Grille is one of South Florida’s favorite Restaurants and Destination Venues for Dining, Music and Special Celebrations. Pavilion Grille was rated “Best Food” on a Wedding Episode of hit TLC show “Four Weddings” and has many “Five Star Reviews” on Wedding and Special Occasion Websites. Please consider us for your next Special Celebration. Call us at 561-912-0000 to plan your private event.
We are located in a spectacular four story, airy indoor office building Atrium with tropical fountains, walls of windows, a canopy-covered 2,000 sq. ft. Dance floor and an amazing Lighting System and parking for 200 cars.
We are open for Lunch and Happy Hour Tuesday through Fridays and Dinner from Tuesday through Saturday.
Our Lunch menu features a variety of Salads and Sandwiches and our amazing Hamburgers and a variety of Entrees.
Join us for Dinner in our Atrium Tuesdays, Fridays and Saturdays and some other nights of the week and listen and Dance to the best local bands for Oldies, Latin, Doo-Wop and Motown music.
Please check our Calendar in advance for our music schedule and to see if we are open due to all of our private parties!
Come for Dinner and try our most sought after Sonoma Salad , Asian Salmon Salad and our Eggplant Rollatini. Dinner Entree favorites include our Orange Glazed Atlantic Salmon, our Chicken or Eggplant Parmigiana, our Sirloin Steak and Braised Lamb Shanks. Favorite Desserts include our Homemade Tiramisu, our Chocolate Fudge Cake and Double Chocolate Mousse Cake.
Bring a group to celebrate Birthdays, Anniversaries, Club or Singles Events and enjoy your Dinner in our Atrium or in our private Grille Room. Ask us for our special Banquet Buffet or Plated Dinner options.
Please check our calendar on www.paviliongrille.com for our Entertainment schedule and blackout dates due to being closed for private parties.
Visit our photo and video gallery for photos and videos of our Restaurant and visit our Facebook photos and Pinterest for photos of Entertainment events and Party Decor. Pricing Packages Pavillion Grille hasn't listed their pricing yet. Connect with them directly to get a customized pricing proposal for your event. Pavilion About Us Our Team Notice Contact Us Insight About Us Our Team Notice Contact Us Insight OUR TEAM OUR TEAM Founder & Group Chairman Young-Gak (Ken) Yun Chairman, Pavilion Private Equity Seung-Ho Hur Founding Partner & CEO, Pavilion Private Equity Hyung-Jin (Bryan) Park CEO, Pavilion Advisors Young-Joon Hong, CPA (US) Co-Founder & Managing Partner, Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. & Pavilion Private Equity Board Director & Investment Committee Member, Marunouchi Innovation Partners John-Paul P. Yun Managing Director, Pavilion Private Equity Jinhwan Kim Executive Director, Pavilion Private Equity Christopher Won Kang Vice President, Pavilion Private Equity Martin Hyunsub Sim Senior Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Yeomyeong (Paul) Kim Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Sungmin Kim Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Connor Kunwoo Lee Analyst, Pavilion Private Equity Kevin Youngjoon Park Managing Director, Europe/MENA, Pavilion Private Equity Dr. J. Michael Zahrt Ph.D. Global Strategic Advisor, Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. Michael Pitsinos Managing Director, Europe/MENA, Pavilion Private Equity Dr. Ha-Sung (Howard) Chung Ph.D. Young-Gak (Ken) Yun Founder & Group Chairman Mr. Yun, Is Founder and Group Chairman of Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. (“Pavilion”) and Founding Chairman of Pavilion Private Equity, a strategic partnership between Pavilion and Mitsubishi Corporation. He is former Chairman of KTB Private Equity, Founder and former Group Chairman of KPMG Korea (Samjong KPMG), and former member of KPMG International Global Board of Directors. In 1990, Mr. Yun founded Samjong Corporation, which formed a partnership with Houlihan Lokey during the Asian financial crisis to play an active role in the extensive restructuring process of the Korean banking industry. Samjong subsequently became a member firm of KPMG in Korea. Over the span of twenty years of his leadership, Samjong grew into one of the largest professional services firms in Korea, employing over 2,700 professionals with over $300MM in annual revenue. Mr. Yun is the recipient of the Korean government’s “Silver & Bronze Tower Industrial Medal” from the Korean government, being the first recipient from the non-manufacturing sector. In 2009, he was recognized as the “Best Korean CEO” by the Korea Economic Daily Business, as well as one of the “Top 30 Korean Business Leaders” by the MK Economy News.  In 2010, he was awarded the “Talent Management Award” by The Korea Economic Daily. In 2011, Mr. Yun was awarded the “Forbes CSR Award”. In 2011 and 2012, Mr. Yun was selected as one of “The Most Powerful Business Leaders in Korea” by Fortune Magazine. Among his many directorships, advisory, honorary and benevolent activities, Mr. Yun served as the Honorary Consulate of Ukraine and St. Vincent and the Grenadines, member of the Accepting House Committee for the 17th President Myung-Bak Lee, Chairman of the University of Pennsylvania and Duke University Korean Alumni Association, Vice Chairman of the University of Chicago Korean Alumni Association, Board Director of SsangYong Motor Company, Board Director of the Seoul Philharmonic Orchestra, Chairman of The Seoul City Government Sharing Economy Promotion Committee, Senior Advisor of Fosun Group, Board Director of Institute of Global Management (IGM), CEO Professor of Graduate School of Business Ewha Women’s University, Advisory Council Member of Seoul National University Graduate School of Business, Member of the Financial Services Commission ‘Financial Hub Committee’, Member of the Internal  Evaluation Committee of The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade, Board Director of The UN Global Compact Korea Association, Board Director of The Asia Society Korea, Board Chairman of Enactus Korea, Member of the World Economic Forum Global Agenda Council, Board Director of The Hope Institute, Board Director of Arumjigi Culture Keepers Foundation, Chairman of Pan-Impact Korea, Member of the Far East Asia Economic Development Committee for the Korean government, and Chairman of Seoul South Rotary Club. Mr. Yun is currently Honorary Life Member of the Board of Visitors of Duke Law School, Advisory Board Member of the Duke University Global Capital Markets Center, University of Pennsylvania Asia Leadership Committee Member, Senior Advisor of Barun Law, Board Director of Hanmi Pharmaceutical, Board Director of Sookmyung Women’s University, Chairman & Senior Partner of FRA Korea, Vice Chairman of The Platform For Tomorrow, Chairman of The Asia Future Institute. Mr. Yun has also established and serves as Chairman of the Board of MYSC (Merry Year Social Company), which helps social enterprises with management consulting and funding support. Mr. Yun earned BA in Economics from The University of Pennsylvania, an MBA from The University of Chicago, and a JD and LLM from Duke Law School. Mr. Yun is a certified public accountant and an attorney at law in the State of New York. Seung-Ho Hur Chairman, Pavilion Private Equity Mr. Hur joined Pavilion Private Equity (PPE) in 2023 after an illustrious career in the automotive industry spanning over thirty-five years.  Prior to joining PPE, Mr. Hur served as Chairman of the Board and Executive Vice Chairman & CEO of Daewon Kang Up Co., Ltd., Chairman of Jiangsu Daewon Asia Automobile Spring Co., Ltd., President of Daewon Asia Automotive Science & Technology Co., Ltd., and CEO of ContiTech Daewon Airspring Systems Co., Ltd.  Mr. Hur also served as Board Director of Daewon America, Inc., and Daewon India Autoparts Pvt Ltd. Daewon Kang Up was founded in 1946 by Mr. Hur’s grandfather and has become the leading automotive parts manufacturer supporting the growth of Korea’s automotive and industrial equipment industries. Mr. Hur received a BBA from Seoul National University and an MBA from George Washington University. Mr. Hur is also the recipient of the “Iron Tower Industrial Medal” from the Korean government. Hyung-Jin (Bryan) Park Founding Partner & CEO, Pavilion Private Equity Prior to joining Pavilion Private Equity, Mr. Park served as Senior Managing Director at KTB Private Equity, one of the oldest and largest private equity firms in Korea. He was the Division Head responsible for deal origination, structuring, funding, and portfolio company management.  Prior to joining KTB PE, Mr. Park served as Managing Director at ConneX Partners (current E-Eum Private Equity), a local private equity firm where he was responsible for deal sourcing, structuring, funding and managing three funds totaling $180 million. Mr. Park held various management positions at KPMG, PwC, AT Kearney, and Oliver Wyman. He has specialized in management consulting and PMI (Post Merger Integration) strategy for numerous projects involving financial restructuring. He has also held position at Korea Long Term Credit Bank, conducting treasury trading, fund administration, and credit analysis. Mr. Park received an MBA and a BA in German Literature from Seoul National University. Young-Joon Hong, CPA (US) CEO, Pavilion Advisors Prior to joining Pavilion Private Equity, Mr. Hong served as President for 4 years at The Code F & I, an investment advisory firm providing M & A advisory services. Prior to The Code F & I, Mr. Hong was a Managing Director at Connex Partners (current E-Eum Private Equity), a local middle market private equity firm where he was responsible for structuring, funding, and managing portfolio companies. Mr. Hong held various positions at Daegu Bank and Shinhan Investment Corporation, focusing on syndication and M & A. Mr. Hong spent 7 years at Ernst & Young Korea where he served as Manager of the transaction services M & A advisory team in charge of due diligence and valuation services. Mr. Hong received a BBA from Hanyang University. John-Paul P. Yun Co-Founder & Managing Partner, Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. & Pavilion Private Equity Board Director & Investment Committee Member, Marunouchi Innovation Partners Prior to joining Pavilion, Mr. Yun was a Vice President at PineStreet Group, a Seoul based private investment firm in charge of overseas business and deal origination. Prior to PineStreet, Mr. Yun was a Senior Analyst at Samjong Investment Advisory, the investment advisory arm of KPMG Korea, responsible for origination, fundraising, and  structuring of alternative investment portfolios. Prior to Samjong, Mr. Yun was as an Analyst at Mitsubishi Corporation responsible for North American steel projects and M & A activities in the Tokyo headquarters, and subsequently became an Associate for Mitsubishi International Corporation in New York City, responsible for principal/alternative investments and business development for the North American market. Prior to Mitsubishi, Mr. Yun was as an analyst at The Chart Group, a middle market private equity firm based in New York City. Mr. Yun also serves as Vice Chairman of the Silk Road Chamber of International Commerce Korea Chapter, and Senior Advisor of Afiniti (Korea), a US based AI and data analytics company. Mr. Yun received an MBA from MIT Sloan School of Management-Tsinghua University School of Economics and Management and a BA in International Business and Economics from Sophia University. Mr. Yun is fluent in Korean, English, French, Japanese, and conversant in Mandarin. Seukhoon Paul Choi Partner, Emerging Tech & Defense, Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. S. Paul Choi ( 최석훈 ) helps lead Pavilion’s emerging tech and defense practice and is an expert in defense, international security, and strategic advisory. His extensive background in policy, alliance management, and geopolitical risk uniquely positions Pavilion to capitalize on opportunities within the defense sector, offering a strategic advantage to both investors and portfolio companies. With over 15 years of experience in political-military affairs, international security, and strategy design, Mr. Choi served as an international relations expert at the United Nations Command / Republic of Korea-US Combined Forces Command, where he contributed to strategic initiatives, operational planning, and policy formulation. He has provided counsel to senior executives in finance, industry, government, and the militaries of South Korea, the United States, and other partner countries. At the Council on Foreign Relations and the RAND Corporation, he led research projects focused on evolving security dynamics and alliance management. Mr. Choi served as an officer in the ROK Army and on faculty at the Korea Military Academy. Mr. Choi also serves as Principal of StratWays Group, a Seoul-based strategic advisory that provides guidance on market expansion, business development, and partnerships within both commercial and defense-related sectors. He holds an MA in International Cooperation from Seoul National University and a BA in Philosophy, Politics & Economics from the University of Pennsylvania, with a PhD in War Studies from King’s College London expected in December 2024. Jinhwan Kim Managing Director, Pavilion Private Equity Prior to joining Pavilion Private Equity, Mr. Kim was a Senior Consultant at Ernst & Young Korea, where he has provided transaction advisory services including commercial & financial due diligence, and valuation services. Mr. Kim began his career as an Associate Consultant at Valtech consulting Korea, a branch of the Paris based management consulting firm, where he has conducted numerous corporate strategy consulting projects focusing on cost & performance improvement, commercial excellence, and new business development. Also Mr. Kim has provided BPR (Business Process Reengineering) advisory services to major government organizations, such as Ministry of Justice and Department of Public Health and Welfare. Mr. Kim received a BA in Economics from The University of Vermont. Mr. Kim is fluent in Korean and English. Christopher Won Kang Executive Director, Pavilion Private Equity Prior to joining Pavilion, Mr. Kang served as Investment Manager at Seoul-based real estate investment firm, Mastern Investment Management, where he focused on leading and managing extensive review processes for overseas infrastructure and real estate investment opportunities. Prior to Mastern Investment Management, Mr. Kang was a Manager at Hana Financial Investment, focusing on equity and debt investments for offshore real estate and infrastructure. As part of the Alternative Investment Division at Hana, Mr. Kang successfully closed over $380MN construction loan of hotels and office buildings in New York City. Prior to Hana Financial Investment, Mr. Kang was an Assistant Manager of the Alternative Investment Division at DB Financial Investment where he was responsible for origination, fundraising, and structuring of alternative investment portfolios. Mr. Kang received a BA in Economics from the University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). He also served as Sergeant of The Republic of Korea Army Special Forces Special Operations Division (“Black Berets”). Mr. Kang is currently a Master Candidate of Energy and Environment Policy from Korea University Graduate School of Energy and Environment. Martin Hyunsub Sim Vice President, Pavilion Private Equity Before joining Pavilion Private Equity, Mr. Sim served as Senior Manager at Simone Investment, a Seoul-based private equity firm.  He was responsible for deal sourcing, fundraising, and managing portfolio companies.  Prior to joining Simone Investment, he worked as a Business Strategy Analyst at TMON where he specialized in setting out business strategies for new ventures.  He also started his career at Vancouver-based asset management firm, Euromerica Investment.  He provided his service as an Analyst for various commodities and assets for the company. He received a BA in Economics from Simon Fraser University, Burnaby Canada. Yeomyeong (Paul) Kim Senior Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Mr. Kim is a distinctive professional with a diverse background in intelligence, international trade, and advanced research in informatics and psycholinguistics. He began his career in public service and foreign trade in his early twenties and quickly distinguished himself through academic excellence and practical contributions to high-level negotiations, generating multimillion-dollar outcomes. He later pursued further education, earning a Master of Public Administration (MPA) from the Seoul National University (SNU) Graduate School of Public Administration. With a strong interest in international law and finance, Mr. Kim has served as a market analyst at Hana Financial Group and as a risk manager at December & Company, an AI-driven robo-advisory firm, before joining Pavilion Private Equity. Mr. Kim’s leadership and achievements have been formally recognized with a commendation from the Mayor of Seoul, underscoring his impact in both the public and private sectors. Sungmin Kim Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Prior to joining Pavilion Private Equity, Mr. Kim was an Assistant Manager at Pavilion Asset Management (current Kyobo AIM Asset Management). Mr. Kim was responsible for a variety of tasks in several divisions, including data center, hedge fund, and real estate finance. Mr. Kim graduated from School of International Liberal Studies, Waseda University. Mr. Kim is fluent in Korean and English. Connor Kunwoo Lee Associate, Pavilion Private Equity Mr. Lee joined Pavilion Private Equity in 2021. He is an Associate of the investment team at the firm. Prior to joining Pavilion, Mr. Lee worked as an investment team intern at Skylake Investment Co. and IMM Investment Corp. based in Seoul. Before that, he worked as an acquisition financing team intern at Yuanta Securities Korea based in Seoul. Mr. Lee received a BA in Economics from Sogang University with the highest honors. Kevin Youngjoon Park Analyst, Pavilion Private Equity Mr. Park joined Pavilion Private Equity in 2023 and now working as an analyst in the investment team. Prior to joining Pavilion, Mr. Park did an  internship at December & Company as a member of alternative investment team. December is an asset management company that manages portfolios through their AI engine. Prior to joining December, Mr. Park did an internship at KIMC, a start-up accelerator company in Hanoi. Dr. J. Michael Zahrt Ph.D. Managing Director, Europe/MENA, Pavilion Private Equity Based in Frankfurt, Dr. Zahrt has broad finance experience and specializes in acting for private equity sponsors, family offices, strategic clients and financial investors on leveraged finance acquisitions and refinancing. Dr. Zahrt´s areas of practice also include acting for corporates on acquisition financings, IPO facilities and general corporate financings. Prior to joining Pavilion, Dr. Zahrt worked for a major German law firm as co-head with a particular industry focus on technology, media and telecommunications. He studied law, Russian and history at Eberhard KarlsUniversity of Tübingen, Philipps University Marburg and at University of St. Gallen Executive School of Management, Technology and Law (ES-HSG). Dr. Zahrt is fluent in German, English, and Russian. Dr. Zahrt is also admitted to the German Bar. Michael Pitsinos Global Strategic Advisor, Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. Michael Pitsinos is an economist and entrepreneur based in New York City. With vast experience in enterprise management, banking, and hospitality, he provides strategic advisory services to investment groups in a broad range of industries including telecommunications, oil, hotel, and F & B. Michael currently serves as the global advisor for Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. headquartered in Seoul, Korea, and is a partner in the Grace Hospitality Group with offices in Los Angeles and New York. Michael previously served the Secretariat of the United Nations in the Department of Public Information, where he reported on the daily activities of the General Assembly and the Security Council. Michael also worked in corporate banking at Citibank and JP Morgan Chase before joining Bareburger, a sustainable and organic restaurant chain with franchises worldwide. Michael holds an MBA and BA. Dr. Ha-Sung (Howard) Chung Ph.D. Managing Director, Europe/MENA, Pavilion Private Equity Prior to joining Pavilion, Dr. Chung was an Attorney¬-at-Law with Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer, a leading international law firm and founder and CEO of janolawAG, a leading legal technology firm in Germany. Dr. Chung advised multinational companies in M & A and other corporate finance transactions and successfully accompanied high tech startups from set up through growth phase and internationalizing to IPO. Dr. Chung studied philosophy, English literature, German literature, Chinese and law in Berlin, Freiburg and Tübingen, received PhD in law from University Tübingen and is admitted to the German Bar. Dr. Chung is fluent in German, Korean, English, French, and conversant in Mandarin. 이용약관 개인정보처리방침 주소 : 서울특별시 종로구 율곡로 6, A동 15층(중학동, 트윈 트리 빌딩) 이메일 : hsshin@pavilioninv.com Copyright © Pavilion Global Holdings Corp. About Us - Pavilion Ministries Skip to content About Us Who We Are Our Beliefs Pastoral Staff Ministries Ministries & Outreach Every Child Matters Street Ministry Natural Hair Care Workshop Trauma Healing Group Just Say Know Drug Education Who Is Jesus? Online Giving Contact About Us Who We Are Our Beliefs Pastoral Staff Ministries Ministries & Outreach Every Child Matters Street Ministry Natural Hair Care Workshop Trauma Healing Group Just Say Know Drug Education Who Is Jesus? Online Giving Contact Facebook Instagram About Us The distinguishing characteristics of the Pavilion Church are based on four foundational truths found in Jesus’ prayer in John 17. Jesus breaks the prayer down into four integral categories: Relationships John 17: 1-5: God in Him, He in us—that we would know Him. Verse 5: "And now, oh Father,
glorify Me together with Yourself, with the glory which I had with You before the world was." Leadership John 17:6-10:  Jesus gave His leadership to His disciples through relationship. Verse 6: "They were Yours, You gave them to me, and they have kept Your word." Truth John 17: 11-19: We are sanctified (consecrated, holy) by the truth (God's Word), as He shared it with the disciples. Verse 17: "Sanctify them by Your truth. Your word is truth." Love John 17: 20-26: The world would believe, through the disciples' words and experience of walking with Jesus, the importance of the unity of love. Verses 23-25: "I in them, and You in Me, that they may be made perfect in one, and that the world may know that You have sent Me, and have loved them as You have loved Me." We, as the Pavilion Church, believe that: Love is the first foundation—learning to love unconditionally as God loves us Truth is specific in the Word of God, as Jesus said in John 14:6, "I am the way, the truth, and life. No one comes to the Father except through me." Leadership starts with family, our jobs, schools and other areas of influence Relationship is the fulfillment of love, truth and leadership. Relationships are the ultimate purpose of life. Our Beliefs are rooted in God’s Word: About the Bible, 2 Timothy 3:16 The 66 books of the Old and New Testaments are God’s Holy Word and are the complete and divine revelation of God to man revealing God’s plan for His people and how to live out that plan and they contain all things necessary for salvation. About God, Exodus 20:1-6 There is one God who is the creator, sustainer and sovereign ruler of all things visible and invisible The Godhead/Triune God eternally exists in three persons, distinguishable, yet inseparable – the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit and are coequal and one God having the same nature and attributes In the Father is the unseen God; in the Son is God revealed, the form of God in man; in the Spirit is the indwelling God – God within us What God the Father has purposed, the Son has procured for us and which takes effect through the operation of the Holy Spirit About Jesus Christ, John 1:1-3 He is truly God and truly man, in whom the divine and human natures are perfectly and inseparably united He was born to a virgin woman, Mary, conceived by the power of the Holy Spirit By the shedding of His blood, He redeemed all who believe in Him, bearing all sin – past, present and future by His crucifixion on the cross He was buried and rose from the dead, being victorious over sin and death He is the only means for salvation, by faith believing that Jesus is the Son of God and that His death and resurrection provide the only means for forgiveness of sins, reconciliation with God, and obtaining eternal life He is seated in Heaven as our Great High Priest, Advocate and Mediator who intercedes with God for us He will return to judge all humanity, claim His church and establish a new kingdom About the Holy Spirit, John 14:15-17 He is one in being with the Father and the Son • He is the power of God dwelling in the human body and working in it what the Father and Son have for us He provides believers with the understanding of spiritual truths He guides believers spiritual growth into a deeper understanding of their identity in Christ, leading them to reach the fulfillment of God’s purpose for their lives About Salvation, 1 Peter 1:3-5 It is a gift from God and is received by grace through faith in the redeeming action of the death and resurrection of Jesus Christ It is obtained only through grace (also a gift of God), not by any action of self-effort It requires repentance – a willful change of mind and genuine sorrow for and confession of sins which the believer is made aware of through the operation of the Holy Spirit Repentance leads to regeneration, being born again, a new creature in Christ Justification is being washed clean of all our sins, “just as if I had never sinned”, bringing us into a relationship of peace and favor with God Sanctification is the ongoing process of being transformed toward spiritual maturity About Water Baptism, Acts 2:38 Baptism is administered by immersion in water in the name of the Father, Son and Holy Spirit It fulfills the command of Jesus in Matthew 28:19 It is an outward testimony of the washing away of sin and freedom from the power of sin It signifies the dying to self and the new birth in Jesus Christ About Baptism in the Holy Spirit, Acts 19:2-6 Baptism in the Holy Spirit is a real and distinct experience at, or subsequent to, salvation It can be evidenced by the speaking in other tongues as the Holy Spirit gives utterance It is the “promise of the Father” fulfilled on the Day of Pentecost, which empowers believers to become effective witnesses for the risen Christ It opens the door for us to enter into God’s supernatural realm of signs, wonders and miracles About Communion, Matthew 26:26-29 Christ instituted Communion at the last supper He ate with His disciples The bread represents His body being broken and that in Him we are made whole The wine represents the blood He shed for the forgiveness of our sins, “the new covenant in My blood” It can be partaken by those who have faith in Jesus Christ as their personal Lord and Savior It represents the greatest expression of God’s love for His people About the Gifts of the Holy Spirit, 1 Peter 4:10 The nine supernatural gifts of the Holy Spirit as listed in 1 Cor. 12-14. The five leadership ministries as given in Eph. 4:11-13 These gifts are operational in the church today and are necessary to equip God’s people for the work of the ministry About Divine Healing, Isaiah 53:5 Deliverance from sickness is provided for in the atonement when Jesus took on all our sicknesses and diseases through His death on the cross In answer to believing prayer, the healing of the physical body and deliverance from demonic oppression by God’s power in Jesus’ name is as valid today as it was in the early church About the Second Coming of Christ, Revelation 19:11-21, 20, 21:1-8 The rapture of the church will be accomplished when Christ returns, fulfilling His words in John 14:3 In that visible return, He will raise the dead, judge the world, separate the righteous from the wicked, bring peace to the nations and establish His millennial reign on earth and, eventually, His eternal kingdom About Satan, Ezekiel 28:12-18, Isaiah 14:12-14, Revelation 12:3-9 He was created by God as an angelic being, led by pride to rebel against God and was cast from heaven to earth with other angels (now demons) who rebelled with him He is the great adversary of God and humanity, working to oppose the will of God He is limited by the sovereign rule of God He will be vanquished at the end of time and be banished for eternity along with his demons into the Lake of Fire About Eternal Life, John 3:36 The soul exists for eternity, either in relationship with God or being separated from Him • Eternal relationship with God is given through Jesus Christ Everlasting life in Heaven with God is granted to the redeemed and everlasting punishment for the unredeemed About Marriage, Genesis 1:26-28 God ordained marriage to be the union of one man and one woman in covenant commitment for a lifetime It is God’s unique gift to reveal the union between Christ and His Church It provides the framework for the man and the woman for intimate companionship, the channel of sexual expression according to biblical standards and the means for procreation of the human race About the Church, Ephesians 1:22-23 We are the church, an assembly of professed believers in the Lord Jesus Christ, who is head over all things pertaining to it We, as the church, are called to serve Christ by reaching out to the lost, sharing the gospel/good news, meeting together in His name for baptism, communion, worship, praise, prayer, fellowship and discipleship As Christ came to serve, His church body exists to serve one another and the external communities in which they live and work Performing arts, visual arts, interactive science and educational opportunities — all under one roof. Learn More Attractions Back Attractions Attractions Visual Arts Center Eight spacious art galleries exhibit works from local creators and international art legends, as well as a focus on Northern Plains Tribal art. Kirby Science Discovery Center With more than 100 interactive, hands-on exhibits, the Kirby Science Discovery Center offers an incredible array of fun and educational activities for all ages, but especially for kids! Wells Fargo CineDome & Sweetman Planetarium The Washington Pavilion is home to one of the most advanced planetarium systems in the United States. The WP Café The Washington Pavilion’s café offers a quick business lunch during your workday, or refuel and savor a great-tasting, affordable meal during your museum exploration. Parlour Ice Cream Parlour features gourmet ice cream, fresh popcorn, candy and cold beverages on the 2nd floor of the Kirby Science Discovery Center. The Washington Pavilion is the region’s home for the arts, entertainment, and science. Attractions Programs Back Programs Programs Kid & Family Programs Join us for a variety of fun activities and demonstrations throughout our museums. Youth Camps and Classes Fun, educational activities for ages 3-18! Learn more about our year-round program offerings. Art for Adults Our educational programming isn't just for kids. Join us for grown-up fun! For Educators Planning a field trip or special event for your class? Look no further! We have numerous engaging and inspiring science exhibits, performances, art and science programs and large format films will help supplement your curriculum. Spotlight Theatre Company Spotlight Theatre Company provides outstanding learning, performance and outreach opportunities for young people ages 6-18 to excel in the performing arts. Graham Academy Preschool Our preschool program for ages 3-5 focuses on the whole child, including social, emotional, academic and creative learning. All of the Pavilion's unique resources are a part of our school day, making Graham Academy the ideal place for early learning Join us for an exciting new season from Spotlight Theatre Company, featuring six incredible youth theatre productions!
